presenters.name: Alice Johnson
presenters.bio: Lightning Network developer and educator with 5 years of experience building Bitcoin infrastructure. Alice has contributed to multiple Lightning implementations and is passionate about making Bitcoin more accessible.
presenters.title: Lightning Core Developer

presenters.name: Bob Smith
presenters.bio: Bitcoin protocol researcher and educator specializing in Taproot and Schnorr signatures. Bob has published multiple papers on Bitcoin scalability and privacy improvements.
presenters.title: Bitcoin Protocol Researcher

presenters.name: Builder Vancouver Team
presenters.bio: The organizing team behind Builder Vancouver, dedicated to fostering a collaborative Bitcoin builder community in Vancouver. We focus on practical skills, structured knowledge, and open collaboration to accelerate Bitcoin product development.
presenters.title: Builder Vancouver Organizers

presenters.name: Builder Ops Team
presenters.bio: The Builder Ops Team stewards the vibe coding workflow behind the Builder website—from structured content design to AI-assisted shipping. They focus on translating experiments with ChatGPT, Cursor, and decentralized tech into educational resources for the Bitcoin community.
presenters.title: Vibe Coding Facilitators

presenters.name: Justin O'Halloran
presenters.bio: Full stack web developer and Chapter Lead for Builder Vancouver, focused on guiding local builders through hands-on Bitcoin and Lightning education.
presenters.title: Full Stack Web Developer

presenters.name: Mat Balez
presenters.bio: Product manager at Spiral.xyz helping Bitcoin and Lightning teams ship polished user experiences powered by open-source infrastructure.
presenters.title: Product Manager

presenters.name: Eric Chennels
presenters.bio: Cybersecurity and cloud computing specialist researching and building secure Bitcoin and Lightning deployments for modern infrastructure teams.
presenters.title: Cybersecurity & Cloud Specialist

presenters.name: Martin Montero
presenters.bio: Project manager at Rabble Labs working on Nostr community development and coordinating open collaboration across Bitcoin builders.
presenters.title: Project Manager
